00091 inline FeatureVector FeatureVector::operator+ (const FeatureVector& featureVector) const
00092 {
00093     // Check if vectors have the same size
00094     if ( this->size_ not_eq featureVector.size_ )
00095         throw NessieException ("FeatureVector::operator+() : Size of vectors to sum must be equal");
00096 
00097     FeatureVector temp(this->size_);
00098 
00099     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < this->size_; ++i )
00100         temp.features_.at(i) = this->features_.at(i) + featureVector.features_.at(i);
00101 
00102     return temp;
00103 };

00106 inline FeatureVector FeatureVector::operator- (const FeatureVector& featureVector) const
00107 {
00108     if ( this->size_ not_eq featureVector.size_ )
00109         throw NessieException ("FeatureVector::operator-() : Size of vectors to subtract must be equal");
00110 
00111     FeatureVector temp(this->size_);
00112 
00113     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < this->size_; ++i )
00114         temp.features_.at(i) = this->features_.at(i) - featureVector.features_.at(i);
00115 
00116     return temp;
00117 };

00120 inline double FeatureVector::operator* (const FeatureVector& featureVector) const
00121 {
00122     if ( this->size_ not_eq featureVector.size_ )
00123         throw NessieException ("FeatureVector::operator*() : Size of vectors to multiply must be equal");
00124 
00125     double result = 0.0;

00127     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < this->size_; ++i )
00128         result += this->features_.at(i) * featureVector.features_.at(i);
